alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 3:56AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Walker and central Jefferson Counties through 430 AM CDT... At 356 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near West Jefferson, or 8 miles south of Dora, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Western Birmingham, Bessemer, Hueytown, Gardendale, Fairfield, Fultondale, Sumiton, Dora, Pleasant Grove, Tarrant, Midfield, Adamsville, Brighton, Lipscomb, Graysville, Sylvan Springs, Brookside, Mulga, Maytown and West Jefferson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
